title: MISCELLANEOUS
description: General commands, you get the idea

commands.name: info
commands.description: Learn about the bot. :)

commands.name: help
commands.description: Alias for /info

commands.name: ping
commands.description: "Pings" DILF

commands.name: game <new-game>
commands.description: Set's DILF's playing status. Only allowed once per hour.

commands.name: jerkcity episode <number>
commands.description: Fetches an episode of Jerkcity by its number

commands.name: jerkcity latest
commands.description: Fetches the latest episode of Jerkcity

commands.name: jerkcity random
commands.description: Fetches a random episode of Jerkcity

commands.name: jerkcity search <query>
commands.description: Searches the Jerkcity API for the given query

title: ROLE
description: User commands pertaining to vanity roles, AKA self-assignable roles. These replace the pronoun commands found in previous iterations of the bot. Roles must be created or imported by a server administrator before being assignable

commands.name: role add <role>
commands.description: Add a vanity role to yourself

commands.name: role remove <role>
commands.description: Remove a vanity role from yourself

commands.name: role list
commands.description: List all the vanity roles being managed by the bot

title: ROLES
description: Moderator commands pertaining to vanity roles; under their own command because Discord sucks donkey balls. These commands require you to have the manage roles permission on the server

commands.name: roles create <name> [hex]
commands.description: Create a new Discord role with the given settings and add it to the database

commands.name: roles delete <name>
commands.description: Delete a role from the server and database.

commands.name: roles rename <new-name>
commands.description: Rename a role. Kind of self-explanatory

commands.name: roles setcolor <role> <color>
commands.description: Update a role's color

commands.name: roles import <one> [two] [three] [four] [five]
commands.description: Import up to 5 existing roles into the database

commands.name: roles relinquish <one> [two] [three] [four] [five]
commands.description: Remove up to 5 roles from the database

commands.name: roles fix
commands.description: Add role names to existing roles in the database; only necessary for guilds using the bot prior to the website update. Exists due to an oversight. Oopsie

title: SETTINGS
description: Moderator commands for configuring guild settings

commands.name: settings quotes set-min-required <minimum>
commands.description: Set the minimum number of reactions needed to quote a message

commands.name: settings quotes toggle <toggled>
commands.description: Toggle use of quote functionality

title: EGORAPTOR
description: Moderator commands for configuring the unfortunate egoraptor functionality. **SCROTEGANG only**

commands.name: egoraptor toggle <toggled>
commands.description: Toggle timing users out when they mention egoraptor eating pussy. Requires manage guild permissions

commands.name: egoraptor settimeout <seconds>
commands.description: Sets the length of an egoraptor-related timeout. Requires manage guild permissions
